resources.string: What would you like your animal to say?

string-array.name: statements_array
string-array.item: I\'m more inclined to participate in group activities.
If a kid is being beat, my instincts would tell me to immediately run away.
I consider myself a thinker, rather than jumping into mindless conclusions.
Of all sports, swimming is the one (that) I\'m least interested in
Global Warming is a Chinese hoax.
